trans-unit.source: Represents a security token provider that provides <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken"></xref> security tokens for a SOAP message sender.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en sikkerhet token leverandør som gir <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken"> </xref> sikkerhetstokener for en SOAP meldingen avsender.

trans-unit.source: In most instances it is not necessary to call the X509SecurityTokenProvider class directly, as it is called when a client sends a SOAP message that requires a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> security token.
trans-unit.target: I de fleste tilfeller er det ikke nødvendig å kalle X509SecurityTokenProvider klassen direkte, som kalles når en klient sender en SOAP-melding som krever en <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken>sikkerhetskode.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken>

trans-unit.source: Specifically, a client specifies the type of security token required, using the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials> class and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials> class calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetToken%2A> method to get a security token.
trans-unit.target: Nærmere bestemt en klient angir sikkerhetskode påkrevde, ved hjelp av den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials>klassen og <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials>klasse kall av <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetToken%2A>metode for å få en sikkerhetskode.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetToken%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials>

trans-unit.source: When the security token required is an <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> security token, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetToken%2A> method calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenProvider.GetTokenCore%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Når sikkerhetstokenet kreves er en <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken>sikkerhetskode, den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetToken%2A>metodekall den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenProvider.GetTokenCore%2A>metoden.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenProvider.GetTokenCore%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetToken%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenProvider"></xref> class using the specified X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenProvider"> </xref> klasse ved hjelp av angitt X.509-sertifikat.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenProvider.GetTokenCore%2A> method gets a security token based on the certificate specified in the `certificate` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenProvider.GetTokenCore%2A>metoden henter en sikkerhetskode token basert på sertifikatet som er angitt i den `certificate` parameteren.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenProvider.GetTokenCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> to get a security token for.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> å hente en sikkerhetskode token for.

trans-unit.source: certificate is .
trans-unit.target: certificateis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenProvider"></xref> class by getting an X.509 certificate from the specified certificate store criteria.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenProvider"> </xref> klassen ved å få et X.509-sertifikat fra det angitte sertifikatet lagre vilkår.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenProvider.GetTokenCore%2A> method gets a security token based on the certificate that matches the specified certificate store criteria.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenProvider.GetTokenCore%2A>metoden henter en sikkerhetskode basert på sertifikatet som samsvarer med det angitte sertifikatet Lagre kriterier.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenProvider.GetTokenCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation"></xref> values that specifies the certificate store location.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation"> </xref> verdier som angir sertifikatet lagre plassering.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName"></xref> values that specifies the certificate store name.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName"> </xref> verdier som angir sertifikatet lagre navn.

trans-unit.source: One of the<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType"></xref> values that specifies how to search the certificate store.
trans-unit.target: Én av de<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType"> </xref> verdier som angir hvordan du søker i sertifikatlageret.

trans-unit.source: The value used to find the X.509 certificate in the certificate store.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som brukes til å finne X.509-sertifikatet i sertifikatlageret.

trans-unit.source: findValue is .
trans-unit.target: findValueis .

trans-unit.source: No certificates match the specified criteria.
trans-unit.target: Ingen sertifikater oppfyller de angitte kriteriene.

trans-unit.source: -or- More than one certificate matches the specified criteria.
trans-unit.target: - eller - mer enn ett sertifikat samsvarer med de angitte kriteriene.

trans-unit.source: Gets the X.509 certificate associated with the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken"></xref> security token.
trans-unit.target: Henter X.509-sertifikatet som er tilknyttet den <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken"> </xref> sikkerhetskode.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenProvider.GetTokenCore%2A> method gets a security token based on the certificate represented by the Certificate property.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenProvider.GetTokenCore%2A>metoden henter en sikkerhetskode token basert på sertifikatet som er representert av egenskapen sertifikat.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenProvider.GetTokenCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> that represents the X.509 certificate of a security token.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> som representerer en sikkerhetskode X.509 sertifikatet.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenProvider"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Frigir alle ressursene som brukes av den <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenProvider"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a security token using the X.509 certificate specified in the constructor.
trans-unit.target: Henter en sikkerhetskode bruker X.509-sertifikatet som er angitt i konstruktøren.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetToken%2A> method is called by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials> class when a client sends a SOAP message and an <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> security token is required.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetToken%2A>-metoden den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials>klasse når en klient sender en SOAP-melding og en <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken>sikkerhetstoken er påkrevd.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetToken%2A> method calls the GetTokenCore method.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetToken%2A>metodekall metoden GetTokenCore.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.TimeSpan> that specifies the timeout value for the message that gets the security token.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.TimeSpan>som angir verdien for tidsavbrudd for meldingen som henter sikkerhetstokenet.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> that represents the security token to get.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"> </xref> som representerer sikkerhetskode for å hente.
